Name: Yonder World: Interview with the Void
About the game: Yonder World follows the story of Vellus, a young angel who has recently received her dream job in Heavens. After a series of disappointing and unfortunate events, she finds herself in a strange world, perpetually drenched in midnight moonlight, whose inhabitants consist of a singular mysterious and infinitely powerful entity, and her few 'visitors'. Help Vellus navigate a world full of lurking dangers and filled with melancholy, in her quest to find her way home. Perhaps along the way, she will learn to undo the knots in her heart and even others'. Or perhaps you will play a hand in plucking her fledgling wings and breaking her halo. * 100,000+ word count horror/romance lgbtq visual novel (estimated 10+ hours of gameplay) * 45+ Beautiful BGs (featuring Inkarnate) * 8+ Endings * Unique relationship choices (Romantic vs. Friendship) * 3+ romantic interests * Item collection and puzzle system
